overview: Antonia Maria Iannicelli is serving a ten-year sentence. From the prison, she tells the tragic events that led to the death of her 3 years old son Nicola, called Coc√≤, killed together with her grandfather Giuseppe and her partner. A case famous for his brutality that shocked Italy and led Pope Bergoglio to excommunicate the Mafia people, responsible for the crime.
title: Mafia is Cose Nostre
